name: 林含怡
objective: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、不同種類英語的出現，以及英語作為通用語言之發展、相關概念與論述。經由閱讀與課堂討論，學生將有機會檢視與英語全球化和全球英語相關的重要議題。
schedule:
1. Course introduction
2. The history of English
3. The global spread of English
4. Language change and diversity in English
5. English in the inner circle (I)
6. English in the inner circle (II)
7. No class
8. English in the outer circle (I)
9. Reading week
10. English in the outer circle (II)
11. English in the expanding circle
12. English as a lingua franca
13. Attitudes towards English 
14. Issues related to Global Englishes
15. Group presentation session I
16. Group presentation session II
17. Group presentation session III
18. Course paper submission
scorePolicy:
Assessment
35% Group research project (written report 15% + oral presentation 20%)
25% Individual course paper
40% In-class performance: class participation and discussion; homework reading and researching
materials:
Seargeant, P. & Swann, J. (eds.) (2012) English in the World: History, Diversity, Change. Abingdon: Routledge.
Crystal, D. (2003) English as a Global Language. 2nd edition. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.
Jenkin, J. (2015) Global Englishes: A Resource Book for Students. (3rd Edition) London: Routledge.
